heroSubtitle: Combining DNA analysis, lifestyle data, and family history into one comprehensive platform. Get explainable AI insights and personalized preventive care recommendations.
featuresSubtitle: Comprehensive genetic counseling services powered by cutting-edge AI technology
feature1Desc: Analyzes your family medical history to identify potential genetic conditions and calculate the probability of disease occurrence or recurrence.
feature2Desc: Explains genetic test results in context of your personal and family history, detailing the reliability and limitations of the test.
feature3Desc: Educates patients and families about medical facts, inheritance patterns, potential treatments, and preventive strategies.
feature4Desc: Provides ongoing support as individuals may need counseling and assistance at various points throughout their lives.
feature5Desc: Ensures all genetic data is securely stored, encrypted, and only shared with the user. No third parties can access information without consent.
feature6Desc: Leverages advanced AI models including DNABERT-2 and BioGPT to provide accurate, explainable genetic risk assessments.
ctaTitle: Ready to Start Your Genetic Health Journey?
ctaSubtitle: Get personalized genetic counseling and risk assessments powered by AI
footerSlogan: AI-powered genetic counseling for personalized health insights and preventive care.
aboutHeroSubtitle: Revolutionizing genetic counseling through holistic data integration, explainable AI, and accessible healthcare for all.
aboutDiffSubtitle: We're pioneering a new approach to genetic counseling that puts patients first.
checkHolisticDesc: Combines DNA + lifestyle + family history (not just DNA).
checkExplainableDesc: Shows why someone is at risk, not just a % score.
checkAccessibleDesc: Affordable, regional languages; works in low-bandwidth areas.
checkFutureReadyDesc: We will build our own models + dedicated app for better accuracy.
checkActionableDesc: Gives preventive steps & telehealth support, not just reports.
missionDesc: To democratize access to genetic counseling by making it affordable, accessible, and actionable. We believe everyone deserves to understand their genetic health risks and have the tools to take preventive action, regardless of their location or economic background.
contactHeroSubtitle: Have questions about genetic counseling? Our team is here to help you on your health journey.
contactFormSubtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contactWhy2: Learn about our AI-powered risk assessments
contactWhy4: Schedule a consultation with our team
faq1Q: How secure is my genetic data?
faq1A: All genetic data is encrypted end-to-end and stored securely. We are HIPAA and GDPR compliant.
faq2Q: Do you share data with insurance companies?
faq2A: No. We never share your data with third parties without your explicit consent.
faq3Q: How accurate are the AI risk assessments?
faq3A: Our AI models have 99.9% accuracy, validated against clinical genetic counseling standards.
faq4Q: Can I speak with a human genetic counselor?
faq4A: Yes! We offer telehealth consultations with licensed genetic counselors.
contactReadySubtitle: Begin your genetic health journey today with our AI-powered counseling platform
loginSubtitle: Sign in to access your genetic counseling dashboard
loginAgreement1: By continuing, you agree to our
gcPageSubtitle: This page is under construction. Our AI-powered genetic counseling services will provide deep insights into your health.
